Flush the sealed tube.sentence: The healthcare provider prepares the sterile saline solution for the flush.
Flush the sealed tube.subject: The healthcare provider

Flush the sealed tube.sentence: The healthcare provider gathers the necessary flushing equipment, including a syringe and alcohol swabs.
Flush the sealed tube.subject: The healthcare provider

Flush the sealed tube.sentence: The healthcare provider cleans the access port of the sealed tube with an alcohol swab to ensure sterility.
Flush the sealed tube.subject: The healthcare provider
Flush the sealed tube.object: the access port of the sealed tube

Flush the sealed tube.sentence: The healthcare provider attaches the syringe filled with saline solution to the access port of the sealed tube.
Flush the sealed tube.subject: The healthcare provider
Flush the sealed tube.object: the syringe filled with saline solution

Flush the sealed tube.sentence: The healthcare provider gently pushes the saline solution through the sealed tube to ensure it is properly flushed.
Flush the sealed tube.subject: The healthcare provider
Flush the sealed tube.object: the saline solution through the sealed tube
